Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: label
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: The label of the LogHandler

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: hostname
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: The host where a Logstash instance is running

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: port
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: The port of the host where a Logstash instance is running

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: useHTTPS
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Specifies if the HTTP connection to Logstash should be encrypted via TLS (so HTTPS instead of HTTP)

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: eventLoopGroup
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: The EventLoopGroup which is used to create the HTTPClient

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: backgroundActivityLogger
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Used to log background activity of the LogstashLogHandler and HTTPClient

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: uploadInterval
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Represents a certain amount of time which serves as a delay between the triggering of the uploading to Logstash

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: logStorageSize
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Specifies how large the log storage ByteBuffer must be at least

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: maximumTotalLogStorageSize
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Specifies how large the log storage ByteBuffer with all the current uploading buffers can be at the most

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: httpClient
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: The HTTPClient which is used to create the HTTPClient.Request

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: httpRequest
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: The HTTPClient.Request which stays consistent (except the body) over all uploadings to Logstash

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: byteBuffer
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: The log storage byte buffer which serves as a cache of the log data entires

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: byteBufferLock
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Provides thread-safe access to the log storage byte buffer

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: semaphore
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Semaphore to adhere to the maximum memory limit

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: semaphoreCounter
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Manual counter of the semaphore (since no access to the internal one of the semaphore)

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: totalByteBufferSize
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Keeps track of how much memory is allocated in total

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: uploadTask
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Created during scheduling of the upload function to Logstash, provides the ability to cancel the uploading task

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: logLevel
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: The default Logger.Level of the LogstashLogHandler

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: metadata
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Holds the Logger.Metadata of the LogstashLogHandler

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: subscript(metadataKey:)
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Convenience subscript to get and set Logger.Metadata

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: init(label:)
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: setup(hostname:port:useHTTPS:eventLoopGroup:backgroundActivityLogger:uploadInterval:logStorageSize:maximumTotalLogStorageSize:)
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Setup of the LogstashLogHandler, need to be called once before LoggingSystem.bootstrap(...) is called

Structs/LogstashLogHandler/LogstashHTTPB.name: LogstashHTTPBody
Structs/LogstashLogHandler/LogstashHTTPB.abstract: A struct used to encode the Logger.Level, Logger.Message, Logger.Metadata, and a timestamp

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: jsonEncoder
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: The JSONEncoder used to encode the LogstashHTTPBody to JSON

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: createHTTPRequest()
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Creates the HTTP request which stays constant during the entire lifetime of the LogstashLogHandler

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: encodeLogData(level:message:metadata:)
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Encodes the Logger.Level, Logger.Message, Logger.Metadata, and

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: timestamp
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Uses the ISO8601DateFormatter to create the timstamp of the log entry

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: dateFormatter
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: An ISO8601DateFormatter used to format the timestamp of the log entry in an ISO8601 conformant fashion

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: mergeMetadata(passedMetadata:file:function:line:)
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Merges the Logger.Metadata passed via the .log() function call as well

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: conciseSourcePath(_:)
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Splits the source code file path so that only the relevant path is logged

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: formatLocation(file:function:line:)
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Formats the code location properly

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: scheduleUploadTask(initialDelay:)
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Schedules the uploadLogData function with a certain TimeAmount as initialDelay and delay (delay between repeating the task)

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.name: uploadLogData(_:)
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html#/s:10Log.abstract: Function which uploads the stored log data in the ByteBuffer to Logstash

Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html.name: LogstashLogHandler
Structs/LogstashLogHandler.html.abstract: LogstashLogHandler is a simple implementation of LogHandler for directing

Extensions/Logger/Message.html.name: Message
